open.title: Vumatel Villages Degraded Performance | Eastern Cape
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting the Eastern Cape, affected clients will experience limited connectivity and degraded performance. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
